translation.en: Agent Merriweather spent the last 25 years...
translation.zh: 莫里韦德特工在过去的25年里

translation.en: ...honing his ability to sense danger. He'd notice anything out of the ordinary.
translation.zh: 擅长感知危险 从常规中注意到不寻常的事情

translation.en: So for some street criminal to get the drop on him...
translation.zh: 所以一般的街头罪犯能把他干掉...

translation.en: ...yeah, it raises some questions.
translation.zh: 的确有疑点

translation.en: Not to mention that he's been shot here twice with a .45.
translation.zh: 而且他这里中了两枪

translation.en: I'm taking a guess here, but from your initial canvassing...
translation.zh: 我得好好猜猜 但是从你们一开始的判定，我敢打赌没人听到枪声

translation.en: ...I bet no one heard anything.
translation.zh: 但是从你们一开始的判定，我敢打赌没人听到枪声

translation.en: Any homicide cop will tell you that sort of thing happens all the time.
translation.zh: 任何负责凶杀案的警察都会告诉你这种事常有

translation.en: I bet they would, detective.
translation.zh: 你说得对

translation.en: -Rosario. -Hello, Miss Sarah.
translation.zh: 罗莎里奥

translation.en: -Anyone want anything to eat, drink? -No, thanks, ma'am. I think we're fine.
translation.zh: 谁要来点吃的喝的吗？ 不，谢谢夫人，我们很好

translation.en: Well, I'm hungry.
translation.zh: 我饿了

translation.en: Tom, sweep downstairs then go for dinner.
translation.zh: 汤姆，你检查楼下然后去吃晚饭

translation.en: I'll sweep upstairs, sit post until the shift change.
translation.zh: 我来检查楼上，然后等着换班

translation.en: -You've been on as long as me. -You gonna make me change my mind?
translation.zh: 你确定？你跟我执勤的时间一样长 你想让我改主意？

translation.en: Detective, if you take a look at the bullet mark on the door jamb...
translation.zh: 探长，如果你看看门缝处子弹印

translation.en: ...you'll see the slug didn't penetrate. It's cedar, a soft wood.
translation.zh: 你会看到子弹并没有穿透木头 这是雪松，一种软木，年老变脆

translation.en: -It gets brittle with age. -So, what are you saying?
translation.zh: 这是雪松，一种软木，年老变脆 -所以你是什么意思？-坏蛋用了消音器

translation.en: Bad guy used a silencer.
translation.zh: -所以你是什么意思？-坏蛋用了消音器

translation.en: That's why nobody heard it. That's what slowed down the bullet...
translation.zh: 所以没人听见开枪 同时降低了子弹的速度

translation.en: ...and stopped it from penetrating the wood...
translation.zh: 使得它没能击穿木头

translation.en: ...which it easily would have done...
translation.zh: 本来很容易击穿的

translation.en: ...had it been traveling at its normal rate of speed.
translation.zh: 如果子弹以正常速度穿过

translation.en: Shooter was standing right here. One other thing, detective.
translation.zh: 开枪的人就站在这 还有一件事

translation.en: Excuse me. Agent Merriweather's firearm. Safety's still on.
translation.zh: 借过，特工莫里韦德的手枪保险没开

translation.en: We assumed he just didn't have time to flick it off.
translation.zh: 我们假定他没有时间开

translation.en: Agent Marin, why don't you explain to the detectives why that is unlikely.
translation.zh: 莫琳特工，为什么你不告诉两位警探那是不可能的？

translation.en: If he was a police officer, it would make sense.
translation.zh: 如果他是警察，还合情合理

translation.en: You're trained to draw your weapon and flip the safety in two separate actions...
translation.zh: 因为在学校里，老师训练你们拔出手枪 然后再开保险

translation.en: ...to avoid accidental shootings.
translation.zh: 这样就不会错手开枪

translation.en: Our academy trains us to draw and flip in a single motion.
translation.zh: 而我们的训练是两个动作一气呵成

translation.en: If he drew his weapon, his safety would be off.
translation.zh: 如果他能掏出手枪，他的保险就会打开

translation.en: A protective agent maybe draws his weapon once an entire presidential term.
translation.zh: 在总统的整个任期内，保护总统的特警人员 可能只拔出过一次枪

translation.en: When we draw our weapon, we intend to use it.
translation.zh: 当我们拔枪时，就意味着要开枪

translation.en: Bottom line, Agent Merriweather was assassinated.
translation.zh: 最起码，莫里韦德特工是被暗杀的

translation.en: I want the murder weapon. I don't care if you have to drag the Potomac.
translation.zh: 我要找到武器，我不在乎你们去找波多麦克

translation.en: If this man was one of yours...
translation.zh: 如果他是你们的同事

translation.en: ...you would've treated him with a lot more respect.
translation.zh: 你们会更严肃对待这件案子

translation.en: Let's get a gurney up here!
translation.zh: 把担架找来！

translation.en: It always amazes me how thorough you are.
translation.zh: 你的细致总是让我吃惊

translation.en: Well, we try to do the best job we can. Hopefully, you sleep better at night.
translation.zh: 我们尽力做到最好 希望你晚上能睡个好觉

translation.en: -And I definitely do. -Garrison, DiPaola.
translation.zh: 我睡得很好 盖瑞森，是我迪帕拉，这里没事

translation.en: -We're good on the perimeter, 10-60. -Roger, 10-60.
translation.zh: 盖瑞森，是我迪帕拉，这里没事 -我负责10-60号位置-收到

translation.en: I let DiPaola go early, so he can...
translation.zh: 我让迪帕拉早走，这样他能

translation.en: ...get something to eat.
translation.zh: 吃点东西

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi.
translation.zh: -嗨-嗨

translation.en: -I miss you. -Oh, God.
translation.zh: 我想你我很想你

translation.en: I love you, Sarah.
translation.zh: 我爱你，莎拉

translation.en: Garrison, DiPaola, where are you?
translation.zh: 盖瑞森，我是迪帕拉，你在哪？

translation.en: -Garrison, DiPaola, where are you? -Shit.
translation.zh: -盖瑞森，我是迪帕拉，你在哪？-该死

translation.en: Yeah, I'm on my way.
translation.zh: 我这就来

translation.en: Hi. So, what the hell is going on here? Aziz, what are you doing here?
translation.zh: 嗨，出什么事了 阿齐兹，你来这干什么？

translation.en: Charlie Merriweather was murdered.
translation.zh: 查理莫里韦德被杀了

translation.en: He--? He was murdered?
translation.zh: 他...被杀了？

translation.en: PID thinks it might be connected to work. Director put us on alert.
translation.zh: 特勤局认为这和他的工作有关 局长让我们警惕点

translation.en: I'm sorry, I know he was your friend.
translation.zh: 对不起，我知道他是你的朋友

translation.en: Was there any kind of shift in his behavior?
translation.zh: 他的行为有变化吗？

translation.en: Was he agitated or worried about anything?
translation.zh: 他易怒或是担心什么事吗？

translation.en: He was a little distant at breakfast on Sunday.
translation.zh: 星期天的早餐，他有点心不在焉

translation.en: Did he tell you why?
translation.zh: 他跟你说是因为什么吗？

translation.en: Said he had a couple of tough days at work.
translation.zh: 他只说工作有点不顺

translation.en: What did he say at breakfast?
translation.zh: 他吃早餐时说了什么？

translation.en: Some gossip, it's kind of personal.
translation.zh: 闲扯了几句，都是私事

translation.en: Nancy, I know how difficult this is for you...
translation.zh: 南希，我知道这对你不是件容易事

translation.en: ...but I need a complete picture if I'm going to investigate this properly.
translation.zh: 但是如果我要破案，我需要完整的信息

translation.en: He thought Pete Garrison was having an affair...
translation.zh: 他告诉我皮特盖瑞森跟

translation.en: ...with someone's wife at work. Just gossip, it's just--
translation.zh: 同事的老婆有一腿 -就是八卦...-是的

translation.en: -Yeah. -Probably not even true.
translation.zh: -就是八卦...-是的 可能都不是真的

translation.en: That's all we need for now.
translation.zh: 眼下我们就问到这

translation.en: You got the lead on Charlie's murder? -Screw you. -What?
translation.zh: -查理被谋杀，你有线索了吗？-去你的

translation.en: Screw you.
translation.zh: -什么？-去你的

translation.en: -You still got a problem with me? -Take your hands off of me.
translation.zh: -你对我还是有成见？-把你的手拿开

translation.en: Christ, doesn't matter what I say to you.
translation.zh: 克里斯，我说什么不重要

translation.en: I don't care if you got a problem with me...
translation.zh: 我不在乎你是不是跟我过不去

translation.en: ...but you show respect when you come to this house.
translation.zh: 但是你来这里就要放尊重些

translation.en: Charlie was one of my best friends.
translation.zh: 查理是我最好的朋友

translation.en: If you have any information, that I want to hear. Otherwise, stay away.
translation.zh: 如果你有线索，我洗耳恭听 -否则，别挡我的路-很好，真有你的

translation.en: You're a piece of work.
translation.zh: -否则，别挡我的路-很好，真有你的

translation.en: You know, Nancy did say one thing...
translation.zh: 你知道，南希的确说了一件事

translation.en: ...Charlie was upset about something at work. Do you know what that might be?
translation.zh: 查理对工作的事感到沮丧 你知道是什么吗？ 不知道

translation.en: -No. -If you figure it out...
translation.zh: 那么如果你查出来了，就来找我

translation.en: -...you know where to find me. -I'll send you a memo.
translation.zh: 那么如果你查出来了，就来找我 -很好，我给你发材料-最好是

translation.en: -Do that. -Hey. Is everything okay? Hey, Jill, yeah.
translation.zh: -嘿，没事吧？-嘿，吉尔，没事

translation.en: -You working with him now? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -现在你跟着他做事？-是的

translation.en: You may learn a lot, but don't listen to everything he says.
translation.zh: 打起精神，你会学到不少 但是不用相信他的每一句话

translation.en: -Especially about me. -Okay.
translation.zh: -尤其是关于我的-好的

translation.en: Pete.
translation.zh: 皮特

translation.en: There some problem between you two?
translation.zh: 你们俩有矛盾？

translation.en: -I thought you were friends. -We were.
translation.zh: -我还以为你们是朋友-曾经是

translation.en: So, what happened?
translation.zh: -发生了什么？-个人恩怨

translation.en: It's personal, let's go.
translation.zh: -发生了什么？-个人恩怨 咱们走

translation.en: -No, you know what, he can go to hell. -Just tell him it wasn't me.
translation.zh: 不，你见鬼去吧，我不会跟他说话 只要告诉他不是我，再跟他说一次...

translation.en: -Tell him again it-- -It wasn't anybody.
translation.zh: 只要告诉他不是我，再跟他说一次... -谁都不是-我没说是

translation.en: -I'm not saying it was. -I wasn't having an affair.
translation.zh: -我没出轨！-辛迪，我知道你没有

translation.en: -Cindy, I know you weren't. -What do you want me to tell him?
translation.zh: -我没出轨！-辛迪，我知道你没有 你想我跟他说什么？该说的都说过了

translation.en: This is why I left him, he's the most pig-headed man I ever met.
translation.zh: 所以我离开了他 他是我见过最蠢的人

translation.en: You still love him, don't you?
translation.zh: 你还是爱着他，对吧？

translation.en: -Hey, Pete, Pete. -Hey, Tom.
translation.zh: -嘿，皮特-嘿，汤姆

translation.en: You know a guy named Walter Xavier?
translation.zh: 你认识一个叫沃特泽维尔的家伙吗？

translation.en: He's a snitch I used when I was working in counterfeit.
translation.zh: 当然，是我过去的线人 -那时我还在查造假案-好的

translation.en: I just fielded a call with him. I said you weren't running informants anymore...
translation.zh: -那时我还在查造假案-好的 刚接到这家伙的电话 我告诉他你不再管线人这一摊

translation.en: ...offered to transfer the call to WFO, PID...
translation.zh: 我要他打给别人

translation.en: ...he said you were the only person he'd talk to.
translation.zh: 他说他只跟你谈

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢了

translation.en: Hey, Publishers Clearing House, my man. You got something for me?
translation.zh: 他来了！出版商清算所，哥们！ 有我的东西吗？

translation.en: You fill yours out yet?
translation.zh: 你填了吗？

translation.en: Every year my mom bugs me to fill that thing out. I never do.
translation.zh: 每年我妈都烦我，让我把抽奖表填了，我都没填

translation.en: -Long time no see, Walter. What's up? -Let's walk.
translation.zh: 好久不见，沃特，什么事？ 咱们走走

translation.en: You got info on that Charlie Merriweather murder?
translation.zh: 你有关于查理莫里韦德被杀的线索吗？

translation.en: -Is that that agent killed on Monday? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 就是星期一在家门口 -被杀的特工？-是的

translation.en: Maybe he stumbled into something he wasn't supposed to like I did.
translation.zh: 或许他惹了不该惹的麻烦，就像我

translation.en: -What was that something? -A plot to kill the president.
translation.zh: -那是什么麻烦？-刺杀总统的计划

translation.en: Walter, you know it's a little more difficult than it sounds.
translation.zh: 沃特，这事没那么简单

translation.en: Not if you got somebody inside.
translation.zh: 要是有内应就没那么难

translation.en: Are you saying there's a mole in the Secret Service?
translation.zh: 你是说特勤局有内鬼？

translation.en: That's right.
translation.zh: -是的-有特工

translation.en: There's an agent who wants to help assassinate the president?
translation.zh: -是的-有特工 -想要暗杀总统？-没错

translation.en: -That's right. -Well, what's his name?
translation.zh: -想要暗杀总统？-没错 -他叫什么？-我不知道，只知道有这么个人

translation.en: I don't know, I just know he exists.
translation.zh: -他叫什么？-我不知道，只知道有这么个人

translation.en: Well, how? Who's giving you the information?
translation.zh: 你是怎么知道的？谁告诉你的？

translation.en: -I want $1 million. -What are you smoking? Be serious.
translation.zh: -我要一百万-沃特，你脑子进水了？ -认真点-我非常认真

translation.en: I'm dead serious.
translation.zh: -认真点-我非常认真

translation.en: You roll these guys up, they gonna know I'm the one.
translation.zh: 我告诉你这消息，你就会调查他们 他们就会知道是我说的

translation.en: -They'll hunt me down. -Protective custody.
translation.zh: -他们会追杀我-我们会派人保护你

translation.en: Yeah, and I'll be dead in a day.
translation.zh: 是啊，那样我死得更快

translation.en: You got a traitor in your organization.
translation.zh: 听着，你的队伍里有内鬼

translation.en: Get me the money and I'll disappear.
translation.zh: 你给我钱，我就消失

translation.en: I find it pretty far-fetched that we got agents in on an assassination attempt.
translation.zh: 老实讲，这太离谱了 你说有特工想要暗杀总统

translation.en: Here, maybe this will change your mind, okay?
translation.zh: 或许这个会让你改变主意，好吧？

translation.en: Call signs, code words, today's encryption keys.
translation.zh: 呼号，密码字， 今天的加密密钥！

translation.en: The traitor is either in the president's detail or in a key liaison position.
translation.zh: 不管叛徒是谁 他要么是总统身边的人，要么担任要职

translation.en: Listen, I want a list of everyone who's got Q clearance.
translation.zh: 听着，我要一份名单包含所有亲近总统的人员

translation.en: And where's the president right now?
translation.zh: 总统现在在哪？

translation.en: Press conference at his house, 20 minutes.
translation.zh: 在白宫出席记者招待会，有20分钟了

translation.en: This morning's action demonstrates our continuing resolve...
translation.zh: 今天早晨的举动表明了我们一贯的决心

translation.en: ...to take on terrorism wherever we find it, anywhere around....
translation.zh: 打击恐怖主义 无论发生在世界的哪个角落

translation.en: How reliable is this guy, Xavier?
translation.zh: 这个泽维尔可靠吗？

translation.en: I've built three counterfeiting cases using his information.
translation.zh: 他帮我破了三起案子

translation.en: My guess, mid-level guy, Barranquilla Cartel.
translation.zh: -关于谁？-巴兰基亚卡特尔组织的中层人物

translation.en: Sir, that's everyone with Q cards.
translation.zh: 长官，所有能够靠近总统的人员名单

translation.en: Polygraph everyone on that list. And stand up a red team to find the traitor.
translation.zh: 给名单上的每一个人测谎 召集一支小分队，找出叛徒

translation.en: I'm going to assume that the hit on Merriweather is connected to this.
translation.zh: 现在，我猜测 莫里韦德的死跟这件事有关

translation.en: Fold that investigation in as well.
translation.zh: 所以两件事一起调查

translation.en: We put Breckinridge in charge.
translation.zh: 我们派布莱克里奇负责整件事

translation.en: -You think he's the best? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你认为他是最佳人选？-是的

translation.en: Pete? He's kind of a protégé of yours, what do you think?
translation.zh: 皮特，他是你们的人，你觉得如何？

translation.en: He'll follow the evidence wherever it leads him.
translation.zh: 他会公事公办

translation.en: Then he's the guy.
translation.zh: 那么就派他

translation.en: You can have anybody you want, from ID, from the field.
translation.zh: 你可以随便挑人 出勤的还是在办公室里，随便你挑

translation.en: You get carte blanche.
translation.zh: 出勤的还是在办公室里，随便你挑

translation.en: -Not right now. -Sorry.
translation.zh: -现在还不是时候-哦，对不起

translation.en: -I told personnel you can lose the rookie. -No, I'm going to keep her.
translation.zh: 我会告诉人事，不用你带菜鸟 不，我要留着她

translation.en: She hasn't been ruined by years in the field.
translation.zh: 她没有沾染出勤人员的坏习惯

translation.en: I will throw a bomb. I come to bomb this country.
translation.zh: 我会让你好看我要炸了这个国家

translation.en: I will use holy bomb.
translation.zh: 你要付出代价 圣战

translation.en: We have intel that al Qaeda...
translation.zh: 情报显示基地组织的代表

translation.en: ...have met at least twice with the Barranquilla leadership.
translation.zh: 和巴兰基亚的领导人至少见过两次

translation.en: You think it's time to coincide with the Camp David talks?
translation.zh: 你认为他们故意和戴维营会谈撞期？

translation.en: Probably. The threat alone interferes with the process.
translation.zh: 很可能，恐吓会干扰会谈

translation.en: We pulled 50 agents. These are people who haven't worked...
translation.zh: 我们从外勤的特工里抽出50名 这些人有两个周期没在

translation.en: ...at the White House in two cycles. We'll integrate with your teams.
translation.zh: 白宫内工作过 他们会融入到你们两队

translation.en: We'll be looking over each other's shoulders until we find this guy, sir.
translation.zh: 我们会交叉检查 直到找出这个家伙

translation.en: Well, do what you have to to protect me...
translation.zh: 为了保护我，你们尽管安排一切

translation.en: ...but I want the threat, investigation, I want everything, kept classified.
translation.zh: 但是我要求一切保密 包括恐吓、调查

translation.en: As far as the public is concerned, I'm carrying on my normal business.
translation.zh: 对公众而言 我只是执行日常办公

translation.en: Is that clear?
translation.zh: -清楚吗？-总统先生

translation.en: Mr. President, we'll need everyone involved.
translation.zh: 我们需要所有人的配合

translation.en: What do you think would happen to the power of the president...
translation.zh: 比尔，如果公众知道特勤局里都有人要暗杀我

translation.en: ...if people thought I wasn't safe from my Secret Service?
translation.zh: 那我这个总统的威严还有吗？

translation.en: It took over 200 years to create the symbol of the presidency...
translation.zh: 我们用了200年才建立的总统威严

translation.en: ...and I'm not going to undermine it with something like this.
translation.zh: 我不允许任何事破坏它

translation.en: Let's circle the wagons, okay?
translation.zh: 咱们联手解决这事，好吗？

translation.en: -You all right? -Fine.
translation.zh: -你还好吧？-是的

translation.en: Good, let's do that. Proceed.
translation.zh: 很好，着手吧，咱们怎么进行？

translation.en: Bill, you're the guy.
translation.zh: 比尔，全靠你了

translation.en: You're the last line of defense.
translation.zh: 你是最后防线

translation.en: You can protect him better than any of us can.
translation.zh: 你比我们谁都能更好地保护他

translation.en: Is there anything else you can think of that will help you do that?
translation.zh: 有没有我们能帮忙的地方？

translation.en: Yeah...
translation.zh: 有

translation.en: ...this:
translation.zh: 这个

translation.en: We're going to win this one.
translation.zh: 我们会胜利的，你们可以相信我

translation.en: Thank you very much. Good night.
translation.zh: 非常感谢你们，晚安

translation.en: Heads it's 6th Street, tails it's 8th.
translation.zh: 晚安，谢谢你们 正面是第六街，反面就是第八街

translation.en: Bravo cars.
translation.zh: 坐B车队

translation.en: Classic is moving the bravo cars.
translation.zh: 总统向B车队前进

translation.en: Copy that. Planned alpha cars, you're off the hook.
translation.zh: 收到，A车队解散

translation.en: Could you put down that knife?
translation.zh: 先生，能把刀放下吗？

translation.en: It's not what they wanted to hear, but it's what they needed to hear.
translation.zh: 不是他们想听的，也不是他们该听的 你好，小姑娘

translation.en: Where did this guy come from?
translation.zh: 这家伙哪来的？

translation.en: He's an old CI of Garrison's, Nine or 10 years.
translation.zh: 他过去是盖瑞森的线人，9、10年前

translation.en: Garrison?
translation.zh: -盖瑞森？-嗯

translation.en: What's wrong?
translation.zh: 有什么问题？

translation.en: -It's nothing. -Are you sure?
translation.zh: 没什么

translation.en: -Yes, it's okay. -How do I find Xavier?
translation.zh: -你确定？-是的 -我怎样能找到泽维尔？-我不知道他住哪

translation.en: I don't know, he's a fanatic about not being followed.
translation.zh: -我怎样能找到泽维尔？-我不知道他住哪 他十分小心，生怕被跟踪

translation.en: You ever tried?
translation.zh: 你尽力过吗？

translation.en: -What? -Have you ever tried?
translation.zh: -什么？-你尽力过吗？

translation.en: He wants a million bucks, Dave, I'm sure he'll contact us.
translation.zh: 他要我们给他一百万，大卫，我相信他会联系我们

translation.en: You better be right.
translation.zh: 你最好是对的

translation.en: You get in touch with us as soon as you find him.
translation.zh: 你一找到他就联系我们

translation.en: Could be any one of them. Makes you a little sick, doesn't it?
translation.zh: 他们中谁都有可能，这让你觉得心烦，对吧？

translation.en: What percentage of your people have had a polygraph?
translation.zh: 你的队里有多少人测过谎

translation.en: Little over half.
translation.zh: 一半多一点

translation.en: Over half? The president's life is at stake.
translation.zh: "一半多一点"？总统的生命有危险

translation.en: Heads up.
translation.zh: 注意！

translation.en: I want everybody in this room to have had a polygraph by 5 p.m...
translation.zh: 我命令这个屋里的所有人在5点前 都要做谎言测试

translation.en: ...or don't show up for work tomorrow.
translation.zh: 否则明天就别来了

translation.en: Were you born in Morocco? No.
translation.zh: -你出生在摩洛哥？-不

translation.en: -Do you live in Bethesda? -No.
translation.zh: -你住在贝塞斯达？-不

translation.en: -Were you born in Alabama? -No.
translation.zh: -你出生在阿拉巴马？-不

translation.en: Have you ever had contact with child pornography?
translation.zh: 你接触过儿童色情吗？

translation.en: Yes. I was involved with an investigation--
translation.zh: 是的，我曾参与过调查... -只要回答是或不是-好的，斯坦，是的

translation.en: -Just yes or no answers, please. -Okay, Stan. Yes.
translation.zh: -只要回答是或不是-好的，斯坦，是的

translation.en: There you go, the witch-hunt is on.
translation.zh: 激动吗？开始抓内鬼

translation.en: Get your polygraph today.
translation.zh: 激动吗？开始抓内鬼 今天做谎言测试

translation.en: How did they get these?
translation.zh: 他们怎么拍到这些的？

translation.en: Night vision camera on a boat.
translation.zh: 在船上安装夜视摄像头，由陀螺仪稳定

translation.en: Stabilized by a gyroscope. Very sophisticated.
translation.zh: 在船上安装夜视摄像头，由陀螺仪稳定 非常精密

translation.en: I'm so sorry, Sarah.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉，莎拉

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: It's gotta be someone inside the Service. Somebody could have picked it up.
translation.zh: 特勤局里一定有内鬼 他们混进了特勤局，他们就是干这行的

translation.en: -They're good, that's what they do. -Who?
translation.zh: 他们混进了特勤局，他们就是干这行的 谁？

translation.en: The same agent plotting to kill John? Who?
translation.zh: 谁？ 是谋划暗杀总统的人？是谁？

translation.en: A hundred and forty-one years... ...there's never been a traitor in the Secret Service.
translation.zh: 141年以来，特勤局里从未有过叛徒

translation.en: Now, all of a sudden, there's two? I don't buy that.
translation.zh: 现在突然之间来了两个？我不相信

translation.en: -Somehow they're connected. -Maybe this is the assassination.
translation.zh: 但是他们有关联 或许这就是所谓的暗杀？

translation.en: This is a death sentence for John. A political death sentence.
translation.zh: 这等于谋杀了约翰的政治生涯

translation.en: That's not gonna happen.
translation.zh: 不会发生那样的事

translation.en: Oh, Pete.
translation.zh: 哦，皮特

translation.en: Sarah. I promise.
translation.zh: 莎拉，我保证

translation.en: Let's get this witch-hunt over with.
translation.zh: 咱们别想抓内鬼的事了

translation.en: -Just relax. -I'm relaxed.
translation.zh: -放松-我很放松

translation.en: -Were you divorced in 1998? -No.
translation.zh: -你是1998年离婚的吗？-不是

translation.en: Have you received adequate training for your profession?
translation.zh: 你接受过足够的岗位培训吗？ 没有

translation.en: No. But I did stay in a Holiday Inn Express.
translation.zh: 没有 但是我去过假日酒店

translation.en: Have you ever violated Secret Service protocol...
translation.zh: 在过去的30年里，你违反过特勤局的规定吗？

translation.en: -...in the past 30 days? -No.
translation.zh: 在过去的30年里，你违反过特勤局的规定吗？ 没有

translation.en: Have you done anything in the past 30 days...
translation.zh: 在过去的30年里，你违反过

translation.en: -...to violate Secret Service protocol? -No.
translation.zh: -特勤局的规定吗？-没有

translation.en: Are you involved in a plot to kill the president of the United States?
translation.zh: 你参与了暗杀美国总统的计划吗？

translation.en: -No. -No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: I could use a few of those.
translation.zh: 给我几片

translation.en: -Thanks. -You look exhausted, Bill.
translation.zh: -谢谢-比尔，你看起来累坏了

translation.en: You look worse.
translation.zh: 你更糟

translation.en: Haven't slept since we went on alert.
translation.zh: 自从我们进入戒备后，我就没睡过

translation.en: Well, I'm back on. It's worse than going to confession.
translation.zh: 我又回来了，这比去忏悔还糟糕

translation.en: Have you done your polygraph yet?
translation.zh: 你做了测谎没？

translation.en: -I can't let you back on duty unless-- -Yeah, no, I'll go now.
translation.zh: 你知道我不能让你重返工作，除非 明白，我现在就去

translation.en: -Is your name Peter Garrison? -Yes.
translation.zh: -你叫皮特盖瑞森？-是的

translation.en: Are you involved in a plot...
translation.zh: 你参与了暗杀总统的计划吗？

translation.en: -...to kill the president? -No.
translation.zh: 你参与了暗杀总统的计划吗？ 没有

translation.en: -Were you divorced in 1998? -Yes.
translation.zh: -你在1998年离婚了吗？-是的

translation.en: Have you violated Secret Service protocols in the last 30 days?
translation.zh: 你在过去的30年里违反过特勤局的法规吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Have you done anything to endanger the life of our president...
translation.zh: 在过去的六个月里，你有没有做过 危害总统生命的事情？

translation.en: ...in the last six months?
translation.zh: 危害总统生命的事情？

translation.en: Not that I know of.
translation.zh: -据我所知没有-回答是或不是

translation.en: -Yes or no answers, please. -No. No.
translation.zh: -据我所知没有-回答是或不是 不是

translation.en: Welcome to Mayflower Hotel.
translation.zh: 欢迎光临五月花酒店

translation.en: Mayflower Hotel, can I help you? Just a moment.
translation.zh: 五月花酒店，我能为您效劳吗？等等，先生

translation.en: -Are you Mr. Garrison? -Yes.
translation.zh: -你是盖瑞森先生吗？-是的

translation.en: Sir, you have a call. You can take it here.
translation.zh: 先生，有电话找你，你可以在这接

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Walk three blocks east on Massachusetts Avenue.
translation.zh: 顺着马萨诸塞街向东走三个街区

translation.en: Take a left on Twelfth Street. Las Palmas Coffee Shop.
translation.zh: 在12街路口左拐，拉斯帕莫斯咖啡店

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Now boarding on track four, the 1213 Acela Express...
translation.zh: 现在，四号轨12：13去阿西乐快线开始检票

translation.en: ...with stops in Philadelphia, New York, Boston.
translation.zh: 会经停费城、纽约、波士顿

translation.en: Now boarding, track four.
translation.zh: 现在四号轨开始检票

translation.en: -FBI! Freeze! -Federal agent!
translation.zh: 联邦特工局，把枪放下！ -联邦特工！-联邦特工局，别动！把枪放下！

translation.en: -FBI! Freeze! -Put it down!
translation.zh: -联邦特工！-联邦特工局，别动！把枪放下！ -枪放下了！-好的，现在退后

translation.en: All right. Back up now. Back up. Turn around.
translation.zh: -枪放下了！-好的，现在退后 转过身！

translation.en: -What were you doing at Las Palmas? -Having a goddamn cup of coffee.
translation.zh: 你在拉斯帕莫斯干什么？ 喝咖啡

translation.en: What the hell's going on here? Is that one of your agents I'm following?
translation.zh: 这是怎么回事？ 我跟踪的是你们的人？

translation.en: Sorry for the crossover.
translation.zh: 搞错了，对不起

translation.en: Pete. I called four times.
translation.zh: 皮特！我给你打了四个电话，你去哪了？

translation.en: -Where have you been? -We're not out until tomorrow.
translation.zh: 皮特！我给你打了四个电话，你去哪了？ 直到明天，我们才能离开这里

translation.en: President decided they should arrive at the summit together. Where were you?
translation.zh: 总统决定他们要一起出席峰会 你去哪了？

translation.en: -Excuse me. -Hi, Bill. Are we gathered?
translation.zh: 借过

translation.en: Oh, here we are. Kate, this is your weekend to catch the trout.
translation.zh: 人来了，凯特，这周末你可以抓鳟鱼

translation.en: -You know that. -I don't like worms.
translation.zh: -我不喜欢虫子-不，是飞蝇钓

translation.en: -Pete, can I talk to you a minute? -Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 皮特，我能跟你谈谈吗？ 是的总统先生

translation.en: We're really, both of us...
translation.zh: 我们都... 对这个局面不熟悉，是吧？

translation.en: ...in uncharted territory here, aren't we?
translation.zh: 对这个局面不熟悉，是吧？

translation.en: An assassin inside the Secret Service?
translation.zh: 特勤局里有内鬼？

translation.en: Inside my detail?
translation.zh: 在我的周围？

translation.en: Now, Bill's been briefing me, of course, but this guy's your informant, right?
translation.zh: 当然，比尔跟我做了简单的汇报，但是... 这家伙是你的线人，对吗？

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -I want to get some of this firsthand.
translation.zh: -是的总统先生-我想知道第一手信息

translation.en: So let's make time at Camp David to do that, all right?
translation.zh: 所以咱们在戴维营找个时间，好吧？

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 是的，总统先生

translation.en: Good afternoon, Mr. President.
translation.zh: 下午好，总统先生

translation.en: Good afternoon. I'll see you at dinner.
translation.zh: 下午好，晚餐见

translation.en: -Karen, how do things stand? -It's time for you to weigh in.
translation.zh: -凯伦，事情怎么样？-您是时候介入了

translation.en: -Can I get you in there now? -Absolutely.
translation.zh: 几个小时后，您能到那吗？

translation.en: The wives are talking about having tea.
translation.zh: 没问题 莎拉，女士们正在聊喝茶

translation.en: -Stop by, it would be great. -Sure.
translation.zh: 如果你能参与，就太好了

translation.en: Tom, we're gonna walk it.
translation.zh: -没问题-汤姆，我们要步行过去

translation.en: What's going on, Pete? Why don't they just tell us...
translation.zh: 皮特，出什么事了？为什么他们不直接告诉我们他们的目的？

translation.en: -...what they want? -It's going to be fine.
translation.zh: 皮特，出什么事了？为什么他们不直接告诉我们他们的目的？ 没事的

translation.en: -Nothing about this feels okay. -It will be. It will be.
translation.zh: 这可不像没事 -会没事的-那家伙给你电话了？

translation.en: Has that guy called you? His name? What's the guy's name?
translation.zh: -会没事的-那家伙给你电话了？ 他叫什么？那家伙叫什么？

translation.en: -Xavier. -Has he called you?
translation.zh: 泽维尔 -他打给你了吗？-还没有

translation.en: Not yet. No.
translation.zh: -他打给你了吗？-还没有

translation.en: -Katie, hi. -Good afternoon, ma'am.
translation.zh: -嗨，凯蒂-下午好，夫人

translation.en: -Would you care for tea? -Hi. It's such a beautiful day.
translation.zh: -嗨-你想喝茶吗？ 今天天气很好，我们在户外喝茶好吗？

translation.en: -Why don't we have tea outside? -Well, that's a great idea.
translation.zh: 今天天气很好，我们在户外喝茶好吗？ 好主意

translation.en: -How was your flight? -Short.
translation.zh: -你的旅途怎么样？-很短

translation.en: -You guys all decent? -Afraid so.
translation.zh: -你们准备好了吗？-是的

translation.en: Your informant's on the phone.
translation.zh: 你的线人打来电话

translation.en: -Do you got the money? -I got $100,000 in cash...
translation.zh: 你搞到钱了吗？ 我准备了一百万现金，还有一份法律文件

translation.en: ...and a legal document guaranteeing you the rest...
translation.zh: 我准备了一百万现金，还有一份法律文件 在抓到叛徒后会保证你的安全

translation.en: -...once the traitor's apprehended. -Yeah, right.
translation.zh: 在抓到叛徒后会保证你的安全 好的

translation.en: We haven't screwed you in the past, we won't start now.
translation.zh: 沃特，我们过去合作愉快 现在我也不会亏待你，否则所有线人都会跑掉

translation.en: Otherwise, all our sources will dry up.
translation.zh: 现在我也不会亏待你，否则所有线人都会跑掉

translation.en: Allenwood Mall food court, 11 a.m.
translation.zh: 11点在艾伦伍德商场的美食街见

translation.en: And don't try to bring nobody. I'll walk if I spot them.
translation.zh: 别带人来，如果被我看见，我就撤了

translation.en: I cannot get there in 20 minutes.
translation.zh: 20分钟不够

translation.en: -Drive fast. -Okay, you heard him. Let's go.
translation.zh: -那就开快点-好的，你们都听到了，咱们出发

translation.en: -Breckinridge and Marin are on their way. -Get the moneybag and a car ready.
translation.zh: 布莱克里奇和莫琳已经在路上 好的，准备好钱袋和车子

translation.en: He knows we're following him. He went to a place with a crowd.
translation.zh: 明白 他知道我们在找他 他去那里是为了能混在人群里

translation.en: No way we'll get surveillance.
translation.zh: 我们去那里没法监视

translation.en: There's no way I'll let you go there without backup.
translation.zh: 等等，我们不会让你单独行动，不

translation.en: No. Chaminski. Chaminski goes with you.
translation.zh: 等等，我们不会让你单独行动，不 -查明斯基跟你去-咱们走

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: -查明斯基跟你去-咱们走

translation.en: At your one.
translation.zh: 在你1点钟方向

translation.en: Watch your three. Watch your three.
translation.zh: 注意你3点钟方向

translation.en: Check your nine.
translation.zh: 检查你9点钟方向

translation.en: Check your nine! Check your nine! Check your nine!
translation.zh: 检查你9点钟方向！检查你9点钟方向！

translation.en: Get down! Secret Service! Get down!
translation.zh: 趴下！特勤局！趴下！

translation.en: Shots fired. Shots fired. Agent down.
translation.zh: 有人开枪了，特工被击中

translation.en: Copy that. Breckinridge to Command.
translation.zh: 收到，布莱克里奇报告指挥台

translation.en: Need backup at Allenwood Mall. There's an agent down.
translation.zh: 我们在艾伦伍德商场，需要支援，有一名特工被枪击中

translation.en: Shooter's blond hair, dark jacket.
translation.zh: 开枪的人留金色头发，穿黑色夹克，在底层

translation.en: He's on the lower level.
translation.zh: 开枪的人留金色头发，穿黑色夹克，在底层 收到，支援已在路上，预计20分钟后到达

translation.en: Available units en route. ETA, 20 minutes.
translation.zh: 收到，支援已在路上，预计20分钟后到达

translation.en: They're shooting. They're right inside. They're shooting.
translation.zh: 他们在交火，就在门后

translation.en: Heads.
translation.zh: 注意

translation.en: -Pete, we're at the north end of the mall. -I'm 100 yards south of you.
translation.zh: 皮特，我们在商场北边，底层 我在你南方100码处

translation.en: Unholster your weapon. Keep it down.
translation.zh: 把枪拿出来放在地上

translation.en: Copy that. Stagger off 10 feet.
translation.zh: -向我走过来-收到

translation.en: Get out of here!
translation.zh: 离开这里！

translation.en: Take the point.
translation.zh: 占领射击点

translation.en: I don't have a visual.
translation.zh: 我视野不好！

translation.en: Go!
translation.zh: 走！

translation.en: Garrison, additional agents and medical assist are en route.
translation.zh: 盖瑞森，这是指挥台 增援特工及医疗援助已在路上，全体人员请注意

translation.en: Break. All units, all units, be advised, shots fired at Allenwood Mall.
translation.zh: 增援特工及医疗援助已在路上，全体人员请注意 在艾伦伍德商场有人开枪

translation.en: One agent is down. There are multiple casualties.
translation.zh: 一名特工被击中，多名市民受伤

translation.en: Shooter is male. Blonde hair, dark jacket.
translation.zh: 开枪人是男性，金色头发，穿黑色夹克

translation.en: Pete. Pete!
translation.zh: 皮特，皮特！

translation.en: You okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: Any idea why your informant wanted you killed?
translation.zh: 你知道你的线人为什么要你死吗？

translation.en: No, I'm wondering the same thing.
translation.zh: 不，我也想知道为什么

translation.en: You might wanna figure that one out, Pete.
translation.zh: 皮特，你得搞清楚

translation.en: Pete.
translation.zh: 皮特！

translation.en: Presidential helicopter just went down.
translation.zh: 总统的直升飞机刚刚被击落

translation.en: This is a NewsCenter special report.
translation.zh: 这是新闻中心特别报道

translation.en: The presidential helicopter, Marine One, has crashed in a wooded area.
translation.zh: 空军一号刚刚坠机

translation.en: The presidential helicopter has gone down.
translation.zh: 空军一号被击落

translation.en: Local police and emergency crews are now arriving at the crash site.
translation.zh: 总统是否在飞机上还...

translation.en: Marine One, the presidential helicopter has crashed.
translation.zh: 空军一号，总统的直升飞机已坠机

translation.en: It happened just moments ago a half mile south of Camp David.
translation.zh: 坠机刚刚发生，在戴维营半里外

translation.en: The chopper went down in densely wooded....
translation.zh: 飞机坠毁在浓密的...

translation.en: I'm told we can confirm that neither the president or the first lady...
translation.zh: 现在我们可以确定 在坠机时总统及第一夫人

translation.en: ...were onboard at the time of the crash.
translation.zh: 并未在飞机上

translation.en: The president and first lady are safe.
translation.zh: 总统及第一夫人很安全

translation.en: If you're just joining us, these are pictures... ...just outside Camp David....
translation.zh: 如果你刚刚打开电视，这是从戴维营外发来的实时现场图片

translation.en: -Flip it off. -Screw this.
translation.zh: 今天早些时候，空军一号在起飞后不久坠机 两名徒步人士目击了坠机过程

translation.en: That leads to the possibility unconfirmed by authorities....
translation.zh: 在空中已经起火 未经官方证实的猜测是...

translation.en: Our friend was insufficiently motivated.
translation.zh: 我们的朋友，做事的动力不够 空军一号可能是被肩射导弹击落

translation.en: We want to make clear, the president and first lady are safe.
translation.zh: 现在我们要再次重申 总统及第一夫人很安全

translation.en: If you are just joining us, these are live pictures just outside Camp David...
translation.zh: 如果你刚刚打开电视，这是从戴维营外发来的 实时现场图片

translation.en: ...where earlier today, Marine One went down just after takeoff.
translation.zh: 今天早些时候，空军一号在起飞后不久坠机

translation.en: Reports are saying Marine and Secret Service personnel...
translation.zh: 有消息称陆战队和特勤局人员在飞机上

translation.en: ...were on the aircraft and were killed in the crash.
translation.zh: 有消息称陆战队和特勤局人员在飞机上 他们在坠机中丧生

translation.en: This crash is being investigated by the White House and the military....
translation.zh: 白宫和军队会携手调查坠机事件

translation.en: -You failed. -I did exactly what I promised.
translation.zh: -你失败了-我答应你的都做到了

translation.en: He wasn't onboard.
translation.zh: 他没上飞机

translation.en: That is the only thing that matters. That is the only thing I give a shit--
translation.zh: 那是最重要的 我在乎的只有这个

translation.en: Do you understand?
translation.zh: 你明白吗？

translation.en: Now, we're gonna meet and we're gonna discuss this.
translation.zh: 现在我们要面谈

translation.en: --deadly against any low-altitude aircrafts. Including jets, prop planes...
translation.zh: 坠机绝对不是任何低空飞机 包括喷气式飞机，螺旋桨飞机和直升机造成的

translation.en: ...and helicopters.
translation.zh: 包括喷气式飞机，螺旋桨飞机和直升机造成的

translation.en: But that comes from witnesses. Has not been confirmed by investigators.
translation.zh: 但是以上说法来自目击者 并未被调查员证实

translation.en: Again, these pictures coming to us about a half mile--
translation.zh: 再次声明，我们刚刚收到这些图片

translation.en: It doesn't look like you're here to bury the hatchet.
translation.zh: 很明显你们不是来唠家常

translation.en: You're being investigated for treason.
translation.zh: 你因叛国罪要接受调查

translation.en: -What are you talk--? -Step back.
translation.zh: -你说什么-退后

translation.en: -Excuse me? -Step back.
translation.zh: -再说一次？-退后

translation.en: -Hey, Jill. -Pete.
translation.zh: -嘿，吉尔-皮特

translation.en: -Matt. -Pete.
translation.zh: -马特-皮特

translation.en: Sorry for the intrusion, sir.
translation.zh: 长官，抱歉打扰了

translation.en: If I failed the polygraph, then why am I still on duty?
translation.zh: 如果我没有通过测谎，为什么还让我执行任务？

translation.en: Director didn't wanna arrest the guy who saved Reagan's life...
translation.zh: 局长不想在没有足够证据的时候 逮捕任何一名曾经救过里根总统性命的特工

translation.en: ...without a little more evidence.
translation.zh: 逮捕任何一名曾经救过里根总统性命的特工

translation.en: How long you worked for the Barranquilla cartel?
translation.zh: 你为巴兰基亚卡特尔工作多久了？

translation.en: What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 你在说什么？

translation.en: Hugo, can you come in here, please?
translation.zh: 雨果？请你进来

translation.en: Pete Garrison, Special Agent Ortega with the FBI.
translation.zh: 皮特盖瑞森，这是联邦调查局特工奥特加

translation.en: -What were you doing at Las Palmas? -I was having a cup of coffee.
translation.zh: 你在拉斯帕莫斯咖啡店做什么？ 我在喝咖啡

translation.en: Takes four hours to have coffee?
translation.zh: 喝咖啡用了四个小时？

translation.en: I was killing a few hours. Is there a problem with that?
translation.zh: 我在咖啡店里逗留几个小时，有问题吗？

translation.en: Tom DiPaola called you four times. You never returned his messages.
translation.zh: 汤姆迪帕拉说他打了四次电话给你 你一个电话也没回

translation.en: And you almost missed the Marine One flight.
translation.zh: 昨天你差点赶不上空军一号

translation.en: They moved the flight up. I was in the coffee shop.
translation.zh: 他们将飞行提前了两个小时，我当时还在咖啡店

translation.en: It was noisy. I couldn't hear my phone. What is this, all right?
translation.zh: 那很吵，我听不见手机响 现在这是怎么回事？你们为什么要跟踪我？

translation.en: What the hell are you doing following me?
translation.zh: 现在这是怎么回事？你们为什么要跟踪我？

translation.en: Las Palmas Coffee Shop is a dead drop for the Barranquilla cartel.
translation.zh: 拉斯帕莫斯咖啡店是巴兰基亚卡特尔必去的地方

translation.en: You screwed up, Pete. You walked into a stakeout.
translation.zh: 你完蛋了，皮特，你走进了我们的监视点

translation.en: I wanna know your go-to guy at the cartel.
translation.zh: 我想知道你和谁接头

translation.en: And I want to know how you were gonna help them kill the president.
translation.zh: 我想知道你是怎么帮他们暗杀总统

translation.en: Why would I wanna kill the president?
translation.zh: 我为什么要暗杀总统？我的动机是什么？

translation.en: -All right, what motive do--? -I don't know, Pete.
translation.zh: 我为什么要暗杀总统？我的动机是什么？ 皮特，我不知道，老实说我也不在乎

translation.en: I know what the evidence is telling me.
translation.zh: 皮特，我不知道，老实说我也不在乎 我只看证据

translation.en: I've given my entire life to the Secret Service.
translation.zh: 我一生都在特勤局服务

translation.en: I've gotten up at 4 a.m. every goddamn morning.
translation.zh: 每天早晨4点起床

translation.en: So is that what this is about?
translation.zh: 所以这就是原因？

translation.en: You're bitter that they didn't make you director?
translation.zh: 你不满多年的辛苦 他们却没有任命你当局长？

translation.en: Don't confuse your own ambition with mine, okay, Dave?
translation.zh: 才不是，别把你的抱负套在我身上，好吗大卫？

translation.en: Come on, think about it. People would understand that.
translation.zh: 才不是，别把你的抱负套在我身上，好吗大卫？ 皮特，你想想人们会理解这个原因

translation.en: I mean, Jesus Christ, you took a bullet for the president of the United States.
translation.zh: 天啊，你曾为了美国总统挡过子弹

translation.en: And in the 25 years since...
translation.zh: 在25年里，你甚至不曾主管过一次总统出行的任务

translation.en: ...you haven't even made shift supervisor on detail, and that I know you wanted.
translation.zh: 在25年里，你甚至不曾主管过一次总统出行的任务 我知道那是你渴望的

translation.en: They don't put guys that bend the rules, not even a bit...
translation.zh: 但是他们不喜欢重用不守规矩的人

translation.en: ...in charge of PPD, do they?
translation.zh: 一点都不行，对吧？

translation.en: Even if they did take a bullet for the old man.
translation.zh: 即便你为老总统挡过子弹

translation.en: Oh, is that your professional or personal opinion?
translation.zh: 这是就事论事还是个人恩怨？

translation.en: I think this whole thing is getting a little personal.
translation.zh: 我觉得你公报私仇 我们有足够证据

translation.en: -I didn't have an affair with Cindy. -This has got nothing to do with her.
translation.zh: -我和辛迪没有一腿-这和辛迪没关 -你接受不了-我们说的不是那件事！

translation.en: -We aren't talking about that! -We're talking about it...
translation.zh: -你接受不了-我们说的不是那件事！ 所有事都跟那件事有关！

translation.en: ...even when we're not.
translation.zh: 所有事都跟那件事有关！

translation.en: You can't look at me without thinking about it!
translation.zh: 你看到我就会想到那件事！

translation.en: -Jesus Christ, you better get a grip. -I got a grip.
translation.zh: 天啊，皮特，你理智点 我很理智，你觉得是我毁了你的婚姻

translation.en: You think I wrecked your marriage, and it has clouded your judgment.
translation.zh: 我很理智，你觉得是我毁了你的婚姻 这影响了你的判断力

translation.en: I am following the evidence and it is overwhelming.
translation.zh: 我只相信证据，现在证据很充分

translation.en: The polygraph. Las Palmas Coffee Shop.
translation.zh: 测谎，拉斯帕莫斯咖啡店

translation.en: You have unfettered access to Marine One.
translation.zh: 你能自由进出空军一号

translation.en: -It was hit by a missile! -It was hit by a missile...
translation.zh: 天啊，是导弹击中的飞机！ 是导弹击中了飞机

translation.en: ...because the flares and the four other countermeasures were disengaged.
translation.zh: 是导弹击中了飞机 因为四个反导弹装置被解除了

translation.en: There were other people who had access to it.
translation.zh: 其他人也能更改设置

translation.en: Explain to me about the bank account.
translation.zh: 解释一下你的银行账户

translation.en: -The what? -Your signature's all over the paperwork.
translation.zh: 什么？ 文件上都是你的签名

translation.en: -I'm being framed. -Tell me that's not your signature.
translation.zh: 我被设计了 -告诉我这不是你的签名-你想想！

translation.en: Think about it! I'm the guy that initiated this investigation.
translation.zh: -告诉我这不是你的签名-你想想！ 是我开始的这场调查

translation.en: Why would I do that?
translation.zh: 如果我想暗杀总统，我为什么要那么做？

translation.en: You initiated this investigation for a traitor...
translation.zh: 你在局里调查叛徒

translation.en: ...so that when the assassination took place...
translation.zh: 这样当暗杀发生后

translation.en: -...you'd be at the bottom of the list. -I'm being framed!
translation.zh: 就没人会怀疑你 我被陷害了！天啊！你想想吧

translation.en: All right, just think about it, all right? You take me in, that's the end.
translation.zh: 我被陷害了！天啊！你想想吧 你把我抓起来，但是那个叛徒还逍遥法外！

translation.en: That guy is out there some--
translation.zh: 你把我抓起来，但是那个叛徒还逍遥法外！

translation.en: The director just rolled up outside.
translation.zh: 局长来了

translation.en: You better start thinking about cooperating.
translation.zh: 你最好老实合作

translation.en: He's in the car.
translation.zh: 他在车里

translation.en: -What're you doing? -Getting a glass of water.
translation.zh: -你在干什么，皮特？-喝杯水

translation.en: Director's come all the way down here to see me, huh?
translation.zh: 局长大老远跑来看我？

translation.en: That's very impressive. It's embarrassing for us, sir.
translation.zh: -真隆重-长官，我们也很为难

translation.en: -Want a beer? -Look, Pete, we're really--
translation.zh: -喝啤酒吗？-皮特，听着，我们真的...

translation.en: Garrison. Back door.
translation.zh: 盖瑞森从后门跑了

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Pete! Pete!
translation.zh: 皮特！ 皮特！

translation.en: Where is he?
translation.zh: 他在哪？

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: This is Breckinridge. He has escaped from the residence into the alley.
translation.zh: 我是布莱克里奇，盖瑞森 从后门跑进巷子

translation.en: Cordon off the area and get back to me.
translation.zh: 封锁这个区域

translation.en: -He got my radio. -He got my gun too.
translation.zh: -他拿了我的对讲机-他拿了我的枪

translation.en: He got your gun? And your radio?
translation.zh: 他拿了你的枪？还有你的对讲机？

translation.en: What are you looking at her for? She's been here two days.
translation.zh: 你看她干什么？ 她刚来两天，你干多久了？

translation.en: How long have you been here?
translation.zh: 她刚来两天，你干多久了？

translation.en: Where to, mister?
translation.zh: 先生，去哪？

translation.en: Just get me out of here.
translation.zh: 离开这里

translation.en: I know it's hard for you to believe...
translation.zh: 我知道现在很难要你们相信

translation.en: ...that Pete Garrison could be involved with something like this.
translation.zh: 我知道现在很难要你们相信 皮特盖瑞森是内鬼

translation.en: To most of you he's a friend. To some, a legend.
translation.zh: 对你们中大多数人来说他是朋友，甚至是个传奇

translation.en: But the fact is the evidence against him is overwhelming.
translation.zh: 但事实是，现在证据充分

translation.en: So how do we find him?
translation.zh: 那么我们如何找到他？首先，要知道

translation.en: To begin with, know this. He is smarter...
translation.zh: 那么我们如何找到他？首先，要知道 他比你们更聪明，经验更老道

translation.en: ...and more experienced than all of you. You've never trained for this.
translation.zh: 他比你们更聪明，经验更老道

translation.en: You are chasing your worst nightmare.
translation.zh: 你们没有过这方面的训练，你们对付的人是狠角色

translation.en: He knows how you think. He knows what you know.
translation.zh: 他对你们的思维、行动流程了如指掌

translation.en: And he knows how you operate. And he will use that against you.
translation.zh: 他对你们的思维、行动流程了如指掌 并会以此对付你们

translation.en: He also knows that it's gonna be very difficult for you...
translation.zh: 他还知道如果你们发现他

translation.en: ...to pull the trigger if you have him in your sights.
translation.zh: 你们不忍心开枪

translation.en: So I want you to take a second and visualize that.
translation.zh: 你们不忍心开枪 所以我要你们想象一下那个画面

translation.en: Because there is a very good chance that is exactly how this is going to end.
translation.zh: 因为很可能 事情的结局就是那样

translation.en: -Can I have one of these here? -Yeah, sure. Take it.
translation.zh: -我能拿走这个吗？-是的，先生，拿走吧

translation.en: -Do you have arrival? -Backstop, Fullback, we have arrival.
translation.zh: 总统会来吗？ 会的

translation.en: Backstop....
translation.zh: 出发

translation.en: Tom DiPaola to Command. Cincinnati wrapping up. We're alpha for departure.
translation.zh: 总统夫人准备离开，我们乘坐A车队

translation.en: I miss the good old days. Know what I mean?
translation.zh: 我怀念过去的美好时光 你明白吗？我真的怀念

translation.en: I mean, I really literally....
translation.zh: 你明白吗？我真的怀念

translation.en: When the smoke cleared, he taps him on the back and the bear says:
translation.zh: 烟雾散尽，他轻拍他的背，熊说

translation.en: "You didn't come here to hunt, did you?"
translation.zh: "你不是来打猎的，对吗？"

translation.en: Get it? Bear.
translation.zh: 明白吗？熊

translation.en: That's not funny, man.
translation.zh: 老兄，这不逗

translation.en: That joke ain't funny at all.
translation.zh: 一点都不逗

translation.en: -Fullback, we're moving. -Roger that. We're set up.
translation.zh: -我们要走了-收到，我们准备好了

translation.en: Welke, DiPaola.
translation.zh: 迪帕拉，总统夫人走向你那边

translation.en: -Cincinnati's coming to you. -Copy that.
translation.zh: 迪帕拉，总统夫人走向你那边 收到

translation.en: Ma'am.
translation.zh: 夫人

translation.en: What are you doing here? I heard you were arrested.
translation.zh: 你在这干什么？我听说你因为坠机事件被捕

translation.en: Whatever you hear the next few days, I want you to know I was framed.
translation.zh: 在接下来的几天里，无论你听到什么 我想告诉你，我被陷害了

translation.en: -I had to tell you to your face. -No, you don't. No, you don't.
translation.zh: -我要当面告诉你-不，不会的

translation.en: -We're going to get out of this. -How?
translation.zh: -我们会没事的-怎么办？

translation.en: I haven't figured that out yet.
translation.zh: -我还没想到-事情变得无法控制

translation.en: This is out of control. You've got to turn yourself in.
translation.zh: -我还没想到-事情变得无法控制 -你自首吧-不

translation.en: -No, no, no. -Yes, you do.
translation.zh: 你必须去，我去找约翰

translation.en: -I'll go to John. I'll tell him-- -I can't let you do that.
translation.zh: -我跟他坦白一切-我不能让你那么做

translation.en: Pete, they think you're an assassin. They will kill you.
translation.zh: 皮特，他们说你是叛徒，他们会杀了你的

translation.en: -You can cover my back. -How?
translation.zh: -你可以帮我-怎么帮？

translation.en: The director has got a daily password for the agents. Find out what it is.
translation.zh: 局长有所有特工每天的密码，查出那是什么

translation.en: Hey, guys. Garrison just used his cell phone.
translation.zh: 盖瑞森刚刚用过他的手机

translation.en: He called Chez Doucette.
translation.zh: 他给饭店打了电话

translation.en: You turned around when it rang, didn't you?
translation.zh: 电话响时，你没看见，对吗？

translation.en: Yeah. I did.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Ballsy. Very ballsy.
translation.zh: 真有胆量

translation.en: DiPaola said she seemed completely unfazed.
translation.zh: 迪帕拉说总统夫人完全未受影响

translation.en: She came upstairs, waited and told him what happened.
translation.zh: 她上楼，等了五分钟然后告诉他发生了什么

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: I'm trying to understand why he came here and why she reacted that way.
translation.zh: 我想知道他为什么来这里 为什么她的反应是那样

translation.en: -This is your post? -Yeah, it is.
translation.zh: -这是你的位置？-是的

translation.en: The first lady doesn't want to believe...
translation.zh: 很正常，第一夫人不相信

translation.en: ...the man protecting her for the last eight months...
translation.zh: 一个保护了她八个月的特工

translation.en: ...is trying to assassinate her husband.
translation.zh: 要试图暗杀她的丈夫

translation.en: That's why Pete came here.
translation.zh: 所以皮特来这

translation.en: He's looking for an ally.
translation.zh: 他在寻找庇护

translation.en: And the first lady is a very powerful ally to have.
translation.zh: 第一夫人的庇护很强大

translation.en: Great. The idea is to secure the entire site.
translation.zh: 太棒了，我们要封锁整个地方

translation.en: I want you to get every stolen-car report for the area.
translation.zh: 我要你搞到这一区所有的失车报告

translation.en: Start looking for cars that were taken within walking distance...
translation.zh: 从饭店的周围开始找失车 然后到附近的地铁站

translation.en: ...or any of the nearby metro stations.
translation.zh: 然后到附近的地铁站

translation.en: Then within those parameters, isolate Accords, Tauruses...
translation.zh: 在这个区域内 我要你将雅阁、福特金牛、凯美瑞和探险家几款车调出来

translation.en: ...Camrys and Explorers.
translation.zh: 我要你将雅阁、福特金牛、凯美瑞和探险家几款车调出来

translation.en: How do you know what kind of car?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道他会偷哪种车？

translation.en: Those are the four most common vehicles in DC.
translation.zh: 在华盛顿区域，这四种车最多

translation.en: Pete knows that. He's gonna want to blend in.
translation.zh: 皮特知道这个，所以他能混进车流

translation.en: And the first thing he's gonna want to do is find his informant.
translation.zh: 他第一件事就是去找他的线人

translation.en: If he tries to breach our computers, we can find where he's connecting.
translation.zh: 如果他试图入侵我们的电脑 我们就能知道他在哪里上网

translation.en: He knows we would know that. He wouldn't do it.
translation.zh: 我们知道的他也知道，所以他不会那么做

translation.en: He could connect to someone else.
translation.zh: -他可以冒充他人登陆-怎么做？

translation.en: -How? -Well, you need that person's password.
translation.zh: -他可以冒充他人登陆-怎么做？ 他需要那个人的密码

translation.en: As a supervisor, it wouldn't be hard to get access to others' passwords.
translation.zh: 但是作为主管，要搞到 他人的密码，不困难

translation.en: Why would he do that? Why even risk it?
translation.zh: 他为什么要那么做？为什么要冒那个险？

translation.en: He was trapped. We have his credit cards, his cell phone.
translation.zh: 因为他走投无路 我们掌握了他的信用卡、手机，他无处可躲

translation.en: He has no other place to hide.
translation.zh: 我们掌握了他的信用卡、手机，他无处可躲

translation.en: -Can I help you? -Oh, yes, ma'am.
translation.zh: -有什么事？-是的，夫人

translation.en: My name is Lawson Smith. I'm looking for a Walter Xavier.
translation.zh: 我是劳森斯密斯，我要找沃特泽维尔

translation.en: Well, lovely boy... ...but he been gone a long time.
translation.zh: 好孩子，但他很长时间没来了

translation.en: This is the address we have on his sweepstakes form.
translation.zh: 抽奖表上留的是这个地址

translation.en: -Sweepstakes? -Yes, I'm with Publishers Clearing House.
translation.zh: -抽奖？-是的，夫人 -我是出版商清算所的-他赢了？

translation.en: -He won? -Well, he's a finalist.
translation.zh: -我是出版商清算所的-他赢了？ -他进入了决赛-一百万

translation.en: -Million dollars. -And you must be his mother.
translation.zh: -他进入了决赛-一百万 -你一定是他的母亲-是的

translation.en: Mrs. Miller.
translation.zh: 米勒夫人，我再婚了

translation.en: -I'm remarried. -Would you have another address...
translation.zh: 米勒夫人，我再婚了 你知不知道其他的地址或电话

translation.en: ...or telephone number where I might be able to reach him?
translation.zh: 你知不知道其他的地址或电话 可以找到他呢？

translation.en: I'd love to help you get in touch with Walter.
translation.zh: 我很想帮你找到沃特

translation.en: Bet he could use the money.
translation.zh: 他一定需要这笔钱，但是...

translation.en: But I don't know where he is.
translation.zh: 我不知道他在哪

translation.en: Walter and me haven't spoke in three years.
translation.zh: 沃特三年没联络我

translation.en: Well, if you do talk to him, tell him we got in touch.
translation.zh: 如果你联络上他，让他联系我们

translation.en: Thank you, ma'am.
translation.zh: 谢谢你，夫人

translation.en: Have a good day.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: -Please leave a message. -Hey Walter, it's Mom.
translation.zh: 请留言 沃特，是妈妈

translation.en: Guy just come by the house looking for you. He's a cop.
translation.zh: 刚才来了一个男的找你，他是警察

translation.en: It doesn't make sense. The only thing this guy cares about in life is his job.
translation.zh: 直觉告诉我，这不合理 他一生唯一在意的就是他的工作

translation.en: And you know this, why?
translation.zh: 你这么想，为什么？

translation.en: Because he went to the Academy a few times...
translation.zh: 就因为他去了你们学校几次

translation.en: ...and ran field exercises? Listen to me.
translation.zh: 给你上外勤练习？ 听我说，我和皮特盖瑞森是10年的好友

translation.en: Pete Garrison was my best friend for 10 years.
translation.zh: 听我说，我和皮特盖瑞森是10年的好友

translation.en: Until he slept with my wife.
translation.zh: 直到他睡了我老婆

translation.en: Trust me when I tell you...
translation.zh: 所以相信我，皮特盖瑞森唯一在乎的

translation.en: ...the only thing Pete Garrison cares about is Pete Garrison. Yeah?
translation.zh: 所以相信我，皮特盖瑞森唯一在乎的 就是他自己

translation.en: Somebody who's not Tom DiPaola just signed in to our databases...
translation.zh: -什么事？-某人冒用汤姆迪帕拉的密码 登陆我们的数据库

translation.en: ...using DiPaola's password. Pulled up an address...
translation.zh: 登陆我们的数据库 下载了位于马里兰安德鲁堡的一个地址

translation.en: -...in Andrewsboro, Maryland. -I don't believe this.
translation.zh: 下载了位于马里兰安德鲁堡的一个地址 我不相信

translation.en: Get the rest of the team ready. Let's go.
translation.zh: 让大家准备好，我们出发

translation.en: Walter.
translation.zh: 沃特！

translation.en: Notify intel we've got a body.
translation.zh: 通知情报局，这里有具尸体

translation.en: Take the cars around to the other side.
translation.zh: 把车开到另一边！

translation.en: Pete.
translation.zh: 皮特！

translation.en: Pete.
translation.zh: 皮特！

translation.en: Damn it.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: This is Breckinridge.
translation.zh: 我是布莱克里奇

translation.en: I'm in a boat at the end of the dock. Set up a perimeter.
translation.zh: 我在码头尽头的打捞船上 -建立搜索区，听到了吗？-收到

translation.en: -Do you copy? -Copy that.
translation.zh: -建立搜索区，听到了吗？-收到

translation.en: Secret Service. Get your men on the back of the boat.
translation.zh: -噢，噢-特勤局 把你的人弄到船尾

translation.en: Pete, don't move.
translation.zh: 皮特，别动！

translation.en: Pete.
translation.zh: 皮特！

translation.en: The traitor is still out there, Dave.
translation.zh: -叛徒依然逍遥法外，大卫-好的

translation.en: Fine. If that's true, come on in.
translation.zh: -叛徒依然逍遥法外，大卫-好的 如果你说得没错，你去自首，我们会保护你

translation.en: -We'll protect you. -The only reason I'm alive...
translation.zh: 如果你说得没错，你去自首，我们会保护你 我还能活着是因为他们不知道我的下落

translation.en: ...is they don't know where I am.
translation.zh: 我还能活着是因为他们不知道我的下落

translation.en: -Don't make me do this. -No.
translation.zh: 别逼我

translation.en: Don't make me do this. Pete!
translation.zh: -没门！-别逼我，皮特！

translation.en: You wanna shoot me?
translation.zh: 你要开枪打我？

translation.en: Forget about the Kevlar. Shoot me in my face!
translation.zh: 别打我的防弹衣，对着我的脸开枪！

translation.en: Dave! My buddy!
translation.zh: 大卫！我的朋友！

translation.en: Come on, shoot me!
translation.zh: 来啊！开枪打我！

translation.en: Come on. Shoot me.
translation.zh: 来啊！开枪打我！

translation.en: What happened?
translation.zh: 发生了什么？

translation.en: I took him down with a shot to the vest. I couldn't take the second shot.
translation.zh: 我开枪打中了他的防弹衣 我没能开第二枪

translation.en: What's the least contained environment the president's going to be in?
translation.zh: 在接下来的几天，总统将出席的活动中

translation.en: G8 Summit. Toronto.
translation.zh: -场面最大的是什么？-G8峰会，在多伦多

translation.en: It's a nightmare for us.
translation.zh: 是我们的噩梦

translation.en: Canadians are allowing the protestors up to the perimeter.
translation.zh: 加拿大政府允许示威游行人士靠的很近

translation.en: Well, the border's not gonna stop them. It's 3500 miles long and barely patrolled.
translation.zh: 过边境难不倒他 3500里长，很少有人巡逻

translation.en: You really think it's him, don't you?
translation.zh: 你认准了是他，对吧？

translation.en: -You scared the hell out of me. -I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 皮特，你把我吓坏了！

translation.en: -I can explain. -What's going on?
translation.zh: 南希，对不起，我可以解释一切

translation.en: What the hell's been happening?
translation.zh: 出什么事了？到底发生什么事了？

translation.en: I think Charlie got wind of an assassination plot...
translation.zh: 我想查理无意中知道一个特工

translation.en: ...by another agent.
translation.zh: 要暗杀总统的阴谋

translation.en: So I wanna check his computer files, see if there's any indication of evidence.
translation.zh: 所以我要检查他的电脑档案 看看是否有证据

translation.en: Is that why there's a car watching the house?
translation.zh: 就因为这个才有辆车监视我？

translation.en: The maroon Cadillac.
translation.zh: 那辆卡迪拉克，他们是谁？

translation.en: -Who are they? -I think they're the guys who got Charlie.
translation.zh: 那辆卡迪拉克，他们是谁？ 我想就是他们杀了查理

translation.en: Hand me the keys to your car. I want you to call the police.
translation.zh: 南希，我需要你的车钥匙 我要你打电话报警，不是特勤局

translation.en: Not the Secret Service, the police.
translation.zh: 我要你打电话报警，不是特勤局 是警察，告诉他们那辆卡迪拉克

translation.en: -Tell them about the Cadillac. -Okay.
translation.zh: 是警察，告诉他们那辆卡迪拉克

translation.en: Waited three hours, nobody ever showed up.
translation.zh: 我在那等了三个小时，没人出现

translation.en: I didn't want to stay all day. She didn't go nowhere. Didn't go nowhere, so I left.
translation.zh: 我不想整天都待在那 她哪里也不去，所以我离开了

translation.en: Well, what do you want me to do?
translation.zh: 你想我做什么？

translation.en: Come on. Yes, yes. I understand.
translation.zh: 是的，就她自己

translation.en: Yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: 好的，是的，不

translation.en: What do you do? What do you want?
translation.zh: 你到底要怎样？

translation.en: I'm not gonna stay there all night. It's not gonna be a problem.
translation.zh: 我才不要一整夜待在那，她没问题

translation.en: No, no, no.
translation.zh: 不，不

translation.en: Yes, yes, by himself. Everything's gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 是的，就她自己 一切都会没事的

translation.en: Your name. Your name!
translation.zh: 你叫什么？你叫什么？

translation.en: Who sent you? Who sent you?
translation.zh: 是谁派你来的？是谁？

translation.en: Come on. Come on.
translation.zh: 快点，快点

translation.en: -Hi, Jill. -Pete?
translation.zh: -嗨，吉尔-皮特？

translation.en: Yeah. Look, I just got into a shoot-out.
translation.zh: 是的，听着，我刚刚跟人交火了

translation.en: 1265 Leslie Northwest.
translation.zh: 西北方向，莱斯利街1265号

translation.en: He's a foreign operative. He's got a lot of passports and a lot of cash.
translation.zh: 他是外国雇佣兵 他有很多本护照和大量现金

translation.en: He's got full security access to the G8 Summit in Toronto tomorrow.
translation.zh: 他有明天在多伦多举行的G8峰会的安全通行证

translation.en: Okay, Pete. We're on it. But I really think you should come in.
translation.zh: 好的，皮特，我们会调查的，但是我真地认为你该自首

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: We've been through the entire place. You have to be straight with me.
translation.zh: 皮特，我们搜了整个地方 但是你要对我坦白

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -There's no body.
translation.zh: -你在说什么？-没有尸体

translation.en: There's blood all over the goddamn place.
translation.zh: -你在说什么？-没有尸体 那地方到处都是血

translation.en: Yeah, there's blood all over...
translation.zh: 的确到处都是血

translation.en: ...but there's no body, no passports, no G8 credentials.
translation.zh: 但是没有尸体，没有护照，没有G8峰会的通行证

translation.en: Listen to me. This is not enough to take back to Overbrook and clear.
translation.zh: 听着，光凭这些不足以洗脱你的嫌疑

translation.en: Dave, I don't know what to tell you.
translation.zh: 大卫，我不知道该对你说什么

translation.en: They're gonna hit him in Toronto, G8 Summit.
translation.zh: 他们会在G8峰会上暗杀总统

translation.en: Pete. Pete.
translation.zh: 皮特，皮特？

translation.en: Sarah?
translation.zh: 莎拉？

translation.en: Listen, I'm leaving for Toronto tonight.
translation.zh: 听着，我今晚启程去多伦多

translation.en: Montrose wants to move me up there early for security purposes.
translation.zh: 蒙特斯出于安全考虑希望我早到那 哦！

translation.en: California. My sister. I'll call her back.
translation.zh: 加州，我的妹妹，我一会给她打回去

translation.en: Well, this is the speech I'm gonna give.
translation.zh: 这是我的发言稿

translation.en: I'm reasonably happy. Maybe you could take a look at that if you get a chance.
translation.zh: 我很高兴 如果你有空，或许可以帮我看看

translation.en: Sure. And then I'll see you tomorrow.
translation.zh: 当然，那么明天见，我会在会议后到达

translation.en: -I'll be up after the meeting. -Okay.
translation.zh: 当然，那么明天见，我会在会议后到达 好的，谢谢

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 好的，谢谢

translation.en: One new message.
translation.zh: 一条新留言

translation.en: Sarah, I want you to know if I don't make it, I was doing my job.
translation.zh: 莎拉，我要你知道如果我没出现，我尽了我所能

translation.en: I gotta turn this off before they track me. I love you.
translation.zh: 我要挂了，他们会查到我的 我爱你

translation.en: Get the crime scene unit out here and rip this place apart.
translation.zh: 我要你立刻找来犯罪调查组

translation.en: -Find me something now. -Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 把这个地方搜个遍，找到蛛丝马迹 是的，长官

translation.en: -Agent Breckinridge. -Agent Breckinridge?
translation.zh: -我是布莱克里奇特工-布莱克里奇特工？

translation.en: Sarah Ballentine.
translation.zh: 我是萨拉巴伦坦

translation.en: Come in.
translation.zh: 请进

translation.en: Excuse me, ma'am.
translation.zh: 打扰，夫人

translation.en: Thanks, Tom.
translation.zh: 谢谢你汤姆

translation.en: -Could I offer you a drink? -No, thank you, ma'am.
translation.zh: -你喝什么？-不，谢谢，夫人

translation.en: You know, most women don't like whiskey...
translation.zh: 你知道，大多数女人不喝威士忌

translation.en: ...but my mama was from Tennessee.
translation.zh: 但是我母亲是田纳西人

translation.en: Pete Garrison and I are having an affair.
translation.zh: 我和皮特盖瑞森有暧昧关系

translation.en: Please, have a seat. And that's for you.
translation.zh: 请坐

translation.en: You know, I don't know all the evidence you have against him...
translation.zh: 我不知道你掌握了什么对他不利的证据

translation.en: ...but I do know why he failed the lie detector test.
translation.zh: 但是我知道他为什么没通过测谎

translation.en: And I know why he was in that coffee shop looking for someone.
translation.zh: 我知道为什么他去那家咖啡店找人

translation.en: Hello. U.S. Secret Service up for the G8.
translation.zh: 你好，我是美国特勤局，来参加G8峰会

translation.en: I got a priority item for the duty officer up at the lab.
translation.zh: 我有重要东西要交给实验室的值班人员

translation.en: That'll be that direction on the eighth floor.
translation.zh: 朝那边走8楼

translation.en: -Thank you. -Sign the log, please.
translation.zh: 谢谢 请签一下日志

translation.en: I need any prints that you can find off this cup.
translation.zh: 我需要这杯子上的所有指纹

translation.en: -Okay. -Thank you very much.
translation.zh: -好的-谢谢

translation.en: See you in about 12 minutes.
translation.zh: 需要12分钟

translation.en: Sweeps two and three now complete.
translation.zh: 2楼和3楼核查完毕

translation.en: I'm gonna be pushing post in a few minutes. If you wanna grab--
translation.zh: 嘿，过几分钟我就要换岗了 -但是如果你要喝杯咖啡-莫琳

translation.en: -Marin. -Hey, Jill.
translation.zh: -但是如果你要喝杯咖啡-莫琳

translation.en: -It's Pete. -A lot of people are looking for you.
translation.zh: -嘿，吉尔，我是皮特-很多人在找你

translation.en: I'm sure they are. Did you find any prints at the apartment?
translation.zh: 我知道 你在公寓找到任何指纹了吗？

translation.en: -No. Nothing. -Well, I did.
translation.zh: 没有 我找到了，吉尔，你得帮我

translation.en: You gotta help me out. If I e-mail the prints...
translation.zh: 我找到了，吉尔，你得帮我 如果我把指纹发给你，你需要多久

translation.en: ...how long is it going to take to check them against FBI and CIA databases?
translation.zh: 如果我把指纹发给你，你需要多久 能比对完FBI和CIA的数据库

translation.en: Five minutes after I receive them.
translation.zh: 五分钟

translation.en: Then I'll call you five minutes after I send them. All right.
translation.zh: 那么我发给你，五分钟后我再打给你，再见

translation.en: I've got a print in here. Could somebody run it for me?
translation.zh: 我这里有个指纹，谁能帮我发出去？

translation.en: -Yeah, I got it. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -我来-谢谢

translation.en: In my experience, a guilty man doesn't break into a station...
translation.zh: 据我的经验看，罪犯不会潜入警局几个小时

translation.en: ...and check fingerprints for a few hours. What do you think?
translation.zh: 检查指纹，你觉得呢？

translation.en: My phone was only on for five minutes.
translation.zh: 我的电话只用了五分钟

translation.en: I was in the neighborhood.
translation.zh: 我就在附近

translation.en: Dave, I can't explain about the bank account.
translation.zh: 大卫，我无法解释银行账户的事

translation.en: -The other things I can. -I know about the affair.
translation.zh: 但是我能解释其他事情 -我知道你的绯闻-不是和辛迪

translation.en: -It wasn't with Cindy. -Oh, I know. The first lady.
translation.zh: -我知道你的绯闻-不是和辛迪 我知道，是总统夫人

translation.en: She told me everything.
translation.zh: 她把一切都告诉我了，我知道你被陷害了

translation.en: I know you're being framed. She showed me the blackmail photos.
translation.zh: 她把一切都告诉我了，我知道你被陷害了 她给我看了勒索照片

translation.en: -So where does that leave us? -We need to find this guy.
translation.zh: 那么我们现在怎么办？ -我们要找到这个家伙-过来

translation.en: -Come here. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我们要找到这个家伙-过来 好的

translation.en: You really are an idiot, you know that?
translation.zh: 你真是个傻瓜，你知道吗？

translation.en: You thought this wouldn't be uncovered?
translation.zh: 你真的认为这件事不会被发现

translation.en: Dave, I love her.
translation.zh: 大卫，我爱她

translation.en: That's practical.
translation.zh: 这理由充分

translation.en: The prints belong to Gennady Ivanov, former KGB...
translation.zh: 指纹属于前苏联特务组织根纳季伊万诺夫

translation.en: ...now works for the personal security service of the president of Karjastan.
translation.zh: 现在是卡扎斯坦总统的 贴身保镖

translation.en: I'm also showing confirmed intel...
translation.zh: 情报证实这家伙

translation.en: ...this is the guy responsible for the Asian pipeline attacks.
translation.zh: 情报证实这家伙 还袭击过中亚输油管道

translation.en: -Confirmed intel on what? -I gotta call you.
translation.zh: 莫琳特工，情报证实了什么？

translation.en: This is a classified conversation. We'll be out in two minutes.
translation.zh: 我们需要单独谈话，两分钟后就离开

translation.en: -Yeah. Whatever. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -好的-谢谢

translation.en: These people have the financial and intelligence resources to pull this off.
translation.zh: 这些人有钱 有情报才能运作这件事 好吧，咱们开工吧

translation.en: You still gotta find the mole.
translation.zh: 我们还要找到那个叛徒

translation.en: We polygraphed every agent with access to the president.
translation.zh: 我们对能接近总统的每一个特工进行谎话测试

translation.en: Yours was the one that showed deception.
translation.zh: 你是唯一一个没通过的

translation.en: We need to figure out how the traitor passed or if he took it.
translation.zh: 我们要搞清楚为什么这个叛徒能通过测试 甚至他是否做过测试

translation.en: Montrose had the list.
translation.zh: 蒙特斯有名单

translation.en: You know, I never guaranteed you success.
translation.zh: 你知道我从未保证这一定会成功

translation.en: Security's tighter than it's ever been. Routes, modes of transport...
translation.zh: 保安比以往更严 路线，交通方式，都是随机的

translation.en: ...they're all random now.
translation.zh: 路线，交通方式，都是随机的

translation.en: Yeah, but not random to you, William.
translation.zh: 但是，这些都是你能掌握的信息，威廉

translation.en: I mean, if you wanted him on that helicopter at Camp David...
translation.zh: 我意思是如果你想总统在戴维营登上那辆直升机

translation.en: ...you could have put him there.
translation.zh: 你是能够做到的

translation.en: No, you've been playing us since the beginning.
translation.zh: 你从一开始就在耍我们

translation.en: All right. Fair enough.
translation.zh: 好吧，很合理

translation.en: That's not gonna work anymore.
translation.zh: 但是以后不会了

translation.en: You did make a deal.
translation.zh: -我们有过协议-是的

translation.en: Yeah. Twenty years ago with the KGB, which doesn't even exist anymore.
translation.zh: -我们有过协议-是的 20年前和前苏联特务组织，但是现在组织都不存在了

translation.en: Do you want out, William?
translation.zh: 你想退出，威廉？

translation.en: Then give me the president.
translation.zh: 那么交出总统

translation.en: Just like you agreed.
translation.zh: 就像你答应过的一样

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: I don't care.
translation.zh: 我不在乎

translation.en: Expose me.
translation.zh: 揭发我

translation.en: I don't care if I spend the rest of my life in prison for treason.
translation.zh: 我不在乎我的下半生将因叛国罪而蹲大牢

translation.en: I don't care if you kill me.
translation.zh: 我甚至不在乎你杀了我

translation.en: Here you go. Have a pint.
translation.zh: -酒来了-喝一杯

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: William...
translation.zh: 威廉...

translation.en: ...if you don't do this, we're not gonna kill you.
translation.zh: 如果你不合作，我们不会杀你

translation.en: We are going to kill her.
translation.zh: 我们会杀了她

translation.en: And we're gonna kill her.
translation.zh: 我们会杀了她

translation.en: And then we're gonna kill her.
translation.zh: 还有她

translation.en: Yes, William, the KGB's gone.
translation.zh: 威廉，你说得对，组织不存在了

translation.en: But we're still here.
translation.zh: 但是我们还在

translation.en: William, it's all right. You do have a way out.
translation.zh: 威廉，没事的 你还有出路

translation.en: But only one.
translation.zh: 但仅此一条

translation.en: When he finishes his speech, take him on the primary route...
translation.zh: 总统结束发言后，你带他去乘坐B车队

translation.en: ...to the B motorcade under the plaza...
translation.zh: 在商场下面，按第一路线出发

translation.en: ...and you take the radios out.
translation.zh: 你关闭无线电

translation.en: And that's it. And we'll do the rest.
translation.zh: 你的任务就完成了，剩下的交给我们

translation.en: Hey, look.
translation.zh: 嘿，看啊

translation.en: You can keep those.
translation.zh: 那些照片归你了

translation.en: I've got doubles.
translation.zh: 我还有好多

translation.en: Jill, it's David. Get in touch with Downing and Medina.
translation.zh: 吉尔，是我大卫，我要你联系唐宁和美迪娜

translation.en: Confirm for me which one did Montrose's polygraph and get back to me.
translation.zh: 核实哪些人做了测谎 然后告诉我

translation.en: -We're on our way to City Hall. -Got it.
translation.zh: -我们现在去市政厅-明白

translation.en: Command post from Apache, follow-up.
translation.zh: 指挥台最新指令

translation.en: Arrive Martinez location, 1740 hours.
translation.zh: 总统将在5：40到达马丁内斯

translation.en: -Copy. -Summit Security, DiPaola.
translation.zh: 峰会保安迪帕拉，总统夫人将要到达

translation.en: -Cincinnati's moving to hold. Copy. -All posts, all posts, be advised.
translation.zh: 峰会保安迪帕拉，总统夫人将要到达 全体人员注意，总统夫人要到达

translation.en: We have an arrival. Only essential traffic at this time.
translation.zh: 全体人员注意，总统夫人要到达 这次只有重要车辆通行

translation.en: -Everybody ready? -Yes, sir.
translation.zh: -大家准备好了？-是的总统先生

translation.en: Let's do this.
translation.zh: 开始吧

translation.en: -Yeah, tell me what you got. -Montrose didn't take the polygraph.
translation.zh: 是我，说吧 -蒙特斯没做测谎-你确定？百分百肯定？

translation.en: You're sure? You're 100 percent sure?
translation.zh: -蒙特斯没做测谎-你确定？百分百肯定？

translation.en: Positive. Polygraphers have no record of Montrose even being tested.
translation.zh: 非常肯定，没有蒙特斯的测谎记录

translation.en: -Neither one of them. -Montrose didn't take the polygraph.
translation.zh: -唐宁和美迪娜也没做-蒙特斯没做测谎

translation.en: Now, let there be no mistake.
translation.zh: 现在让我重申，在这个充满不确定和危险的世界里

translation.en: In an uncertain and an unsafe world, America must be strong.
translation.zh: 现在让我重申，在这个充满不确定和危险的世界里 美国必须强硬

translation.en: Previous administrations....
translation.zh: 但是前任政府

translation.en: You know, I hacked into Merriweather's staff mail.
translation.zh: 我还入侵了莫里韦德的办公邮件

translation.en: He was streaming someone's offshore phone logs.
translation.zh: 他监听了某人的远程电话日志

translation.en: -The logs are Montrose's. -Give me the phone.
translation.zh: -那个人就是蒙特斯-把电话给我

translation.en: Jill, it's Pete. Get ahold of the first lady...
translation.zh: 嘿，吉尔，是我皮特 找到第一夫人，就告诉她一个人，叛徒是蒙特斯

translation.en: ...and tell her, only her, that it's Montrose.
translation.zh: 找到第一夫人，就告诉她一个人，叛徒是蒙特斯

translation.en: Got it.
translation.zh: 明白

translation.en: Jesus Christ, Pete. The first lady? What were you thinking?
translation.zh: 天啊，皮特，第一夫人？你是怎么想的？

translation.en: I never saw it coming, Dave.
translation.zh: 大卫，我从没料到

translation.en: Command post, from post 209...
translation.zh: 美国特工进入近距离防卫区 请指示，嫌犯盖瑞森被放行

translation.en: ...be advised, Garrison has been let through the perimeter.
translation.zh: 请指示，嫌犯盖瑞森被放行

translation.en: -I got a scope on Garrison. -Be advised.
translation.zh: 我能看到目标人盖瑞森

translation.en: -I got Garrison through the three. -This resolution cannot function alone.
translation.zh: 天啊！三个人中有一个是盖瑞森 光有决心是不够的，需要...

translation.en: It's designed to function....
translation.zh: 光有决心是不够的，需要...

translation.en: It's Garrison and Breck.
translation.zh: 是盖瑞森和布莱克

translation.en: Holster your weapon! Holster your weapon!
translation.zh: 交出武器，交出武器！

translation.en: I'm Breckinridge, investigator. I issued the warrant on Pete Garrison.
translation.zh: 我是特工布莱克里奇，我为皮特盖瑞森担保

translation.en: Subject in my sight. Do I take the shot?
translation.zh: 目标人在视野内，要开枪吗？

translation.en: We must ratify the Kyoto Protocol.
translation.zh: 我们必须批准京都议定书

translation.en: -We must embrace an African union. -Do you need assistance?
translation.zh: -我们必须赞同...-需要援助，完毕 非洲经济一体化

translation.en: -Command. -He's a "Do Not Admit."
translation.zh: -他不能进入-我们有命令

translation.en: -We have orders. -I'm countermanding orders.
translation.zh: -他不能进入-我们有命令 -我撤销你的命令-你不管这里

translation.en: -You don't control. Montrose does. -Don't call him!
translation.zh: -我撤销你的命令-你不管这里 -蒙特斯负责这里-别呼叫他！

translation.en: -Montrose is the mole. -Montrose?
translation.zh: -蒙特斯是内鬼-蒙特斯？

translation.en: -What's the procedure for that? -Where are you going?
translation.zh: 现在怎么办？ -你要去哪？-我要找到第一夫人

translation.en: -I have to talk to the first lady. -No unauthorized personnel...
translation.zh: -你要去哪？-我要找到第一夫人 未经许可，任何人不得进入近距离保卫区

translation.en: ...beyond the two perimeter. All posts, lock down the two perimeter.
translation.zh: 未经许可，任何人不得进入近距离保卫区 夫人

translation.en: Something's wrong.
translation.zh: 出事了，我的无线电信号没了

translation.en: My radio just went dead. I've lost my radio. I don't have radio.
translation.zh: 出事了，我的无线电信号没了 无线电信号没了

translation.en: -I'm not hearing chatter. -I've got silence.
translation.zh: -我听不见指令-所有频道都没声音

translation.en: -It's going down. -Agent Garrison called on my line.
translation.zh: -要出事了！-盖瑞森给我打电话

translation.en: He wanted me to tell you that Montrose is the mole.
translation.zh: 他让我转告你，蒙特斯是内鬼

translation.en: But I strongly believe that we can protect our vital interests...
translation.zh: 但是我坚定地相信我们可以在不引起仇恨的前提下

translation.en: ...without causing so much resentment.
translation.zh: 保护我们重要的利益

translation.en: Freeze, freeze, put that down. Put your hands in the air.
translation.zh: 举起手来！ -把枪放下！-皮特盖瑞森不是内鬼！

translation.en: Mr. President, we've gotta go.
translation.zh: -总统先生-听我说！

translation.en: Do not let him move the president.
translation.zh: 不要让他带走总统！

translation.en: -This way. -Don't let Montrose move the president.
translation.zh: 总统先生，跟我来 不要让蒙特斯带走总统！

translation.en: -Montrose, he's getting away right now. -Crystal!
translation.zh: 蒙特斯，他要跑了！ 水晶，水晶是密码

translation.en: Crystal is the password.
translation.zh: 水晶，水晶是密码

translation.en: -We need your help. -Get the first lady to the motorcade.
translation.zh: 我们需要你的帮助，汤姆，带第一夫人上车

translation.en: -Freeze! -Password is Crystal.
translation.zh: -别动！-密码是水晶

translation.en: -Did Montrose take him? -Motorcade B.
translation.zh: -蒙特斯带总统去哪了？-B车队

translation.en: -Stay with me, ma'am. -It's here.
translation.zh: 夫人，跟着我

translation.en: This way.
translation.zh: 这边

translation.en: Tom, where are we going?
translation.zh: -这边走，夫人-汤姆，我们去哪？

translation.en: We're going to motorcade C.
translation.zh: 我们去C车队，夫人

translation.en: That's a hell of a way to leave the G8.
translation.zh: 这路可真长

translation.en: What is going on with these goddamn radios?
translation.zh: 无线电信号怎么了？

translation.en: Go in twos.
translation.zh: 两两一队

translation.en: What's next, boss?
translation.zh: 长官，怎么办？接下来怎么办？

translation.en: -What's the next move? -What's next?
translation.zh: 长官，怎么办？接下来怎么办？ -下一步？-比尔？

translation.en: Bill.
translation.zh: -下一步？-比尔？

translation.en: Hold the corridor. Push them back.
translation.zh: 守住走廊，别让他们进来

translation.en: Crystal.
translation.zh: 水晶！

translation.en: Pete, we're cut off from the B motorcade.
translation.zh: 皮特，去B车队的路被堵死了

translation.en: You okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: -I think so. -Turn off your locator.
translation.zh: -是的-关闭你的定位仪

translation.en: -What? -Your locator, turn it off.
translation.zh: 什么？ 关闭你的定位仪

translation.en: That's how they know. They're tracking us.
translation.zh: 他们就是用那个追踪我们

translation.en: How do you--? How do you know?
translation.zh: 你，你怎么知道？

translation.en: Oh, no. Bill. Oh, God.
translation.zh: 哦，不，比尔，天啊

translation.en: Montrose was....
translation.zh: 蒙特斯是

translation.en: Pete. Pete.
translation.zh: 皮特，皮特

translation.en: My family. My family, Pete.
translation.zh: 我的家人，皮特！

translation.en: Mr. President, you're gonna have to trust us.
translation.zh: 总统先生，你得信任我们

translation.en: We're gonna get you up top to the evac car.
translation.zh: 我们要带你去顶层坐车离开这里

translation.en: Shooter's at eleven o'clock. I'll go high. You go low. You ready?
translation.zh: 枪手在11点钟方向，我向上，你向下，明白吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Go.
translation.zh: -是的-走

translation.en: Get the president upstairs. We'll cover you from here.
translation.zh: 护送总统上楼，我们在这掩护

translation.en: This way, ma'am. Quick as you can.
translation.zh: 夫人，这边，快点

translation.en: Yeah, it's Garrison. We need a hard car for the president at Southwest Two.
translation.zh: 是的，盖瑞森 总统需要一辆车，在西南2号位

translation.en: Coming to you, Pete. Go! Go! Go!
translation.zh: 皮特，这就来，快开车！

translation.en: Southwest stairs. Let's go get him!
translation.zh: 西南楼梯，去接他们

translation.en: All right, we're gonna get you out of here.
translation.zh: 好了，我们将带您离开这里

translation.en: Get me a perimeter. Ten meters, 360 degrees!
translation.zh: 给我围一个保护区，10米长的圆圈

translation.en: President's hard car. Let's get him in!
translation.zh: 车来了！护送总统上车！

translation.en: I got him. Mr. President, you're with me.
translation.zh: 皮特，我来了，总统先生，跟着我

translation.en: The president is away!
translation.zh: 总统上车了！

translation.en: Go, go, go!
translation.zh: 快，快！

translation.en: Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 哦，天啊！

translation.en: -Secure the first lady! -We need a hard car now!
translation.zh: -保护第一夫人！-我们需要救援车，现在就要！

translation.en: Carl.
translation.zh: 卡尔

translation.en: Listen, Pete, I--
translation.zh: 听着，皮特

translation.en: You take care of yourself now.
translation.zh: 你保重

translation.en: I'll save you a tee time.
translation.zh: 找时间咱们喝茶

translation.en: Tom, you did a great job. I was proud to work with you.
translation.zh: 汤姆，你干得不错，很高兴和你共事

translation.en: -Thanks. -Thanks a lot.
translation.zh: -谢谢-非常感谢

translation.en: All right. See you guys. -Take care, Pete. -Good careers.
translation.zh: 再见，祝你们事业有成

translation.en: -Thank you. Thanks. -We're gonna miss you.
translation.zh: 保重

translation.en: Well, guys. See you soon.
translation.zh: 好好干，再见

translation.en: -Hey, Pete. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -嘿，皮特-什么事？

translation.en: This could be trouble. Oh, sh--
translation.zh: 这可不是什么好东西

translation.en: I'm gonna walk out of the White House carrying this?
translation.zh: 我要拿着这个走出白宫？

translation.en: Thanks, guys.
translation.zh: 谢谢大家

translation.en: -Bye-bye. All the best to you. -Hey, Pete.
translation.zh: -再见，保重-嘿，皮特！

translation.en: Gonna leave without saying goodbye?
translation.zh: 你要不辞而别？

translation.en: Well, look who's no longer a rookie.
translation.zh: 看看昔日的菜鸟

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: So how about a retirement dinner tonight?
translation.zh: 那么，晚上来顿退休晚餐怎样？

translation.en: Can't. I got a date.
translation.zh: 不行，我有约

translation.en: Something you wanna tell me? With my wife.
translation.zh: -有喜事要分享吗？-是和我老婆

translation.en: That's great.
translation.zh: 那太好了

translation.en: Pete. See you on campus, Jill.
translation.zh: -皮特-校园见，吉尔

translation.en: -Thanks for everything. -My pleasure.
translation.zh: -谢谢你-不客气

translation.en: Yeah, I'm gonna miss it.
translation.zh: 是啊，我会怀念这里的

translation.en: It's gonna miss you too.
translation.zh: 也会想念你

translation.en: Take care.
translation.zh: 保重
